greeting.text: Welcome to Grid-Town! I'm Max, head of security. Please enjoy your stay and let me know if you see anything suspicious!

safety.text: Absolutely! Grid-Town is one of the safest communities around. We have 24/7 monitoring and a friendly community that looks out for each other.

rules.text: Simple rules: Be respectful to others, don't block pathways, and have fun! If you need help, talk to Sam the Greeter or visit the info board.
